text:
yaqj~jasyaq sami#ShTyai prANApAqnau vA Eqtau pa#SUqnAM ~Myat pRu#ShadAqjyamAqtmA vaqpA 
pRu#ShadAqjyama#BiqGArya# vaqpAmaqBi GA#rayatyAqtmannEqva pa#SUqnAM prA#NApAqnau da#dhAtiq 
svAhOqd^^rdhvana#BasaM mAruqtaM ga#cCataqmityA#hOqd^^rdhvana#BA ha smaq vai mA#ruqtO dEqvAnA$M ~MvapAqSrapa#NIq pra ha#ratiq tEnaiqvainEq pra ha#ratiq viShU#cIq pra ha#ratiq tasmAqd viShva#~jcau prANApAqnau || 50
(svadhi#ti - ScaiqvA - cCi#nnO - haqvyEnEq - ShyEtyA#haq - ShaTca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A9)
